messages.message: I get ERROR on some of my fields. With the app run logs feature, should I be able to see what the error messages are? cc @jack.robbins @andy

Anything that was in the IB platform's flow logs table should be accessible in AI Hub now, so it should have more details if it was supported previously. You can access the logs from any runs table in the actions menu.

We have a follow-up initiative to add search & filters, but unfortunately didn't have space in Q1.

For most users, I feel like they would just care about the specific field's error. In my case, the field has a UDF and this is pretty much the only relevant log line. I wonder if there's a way to show just the field-specific error. Flow logs contain everything, much of which is not even real errors (like the "Solution not found" issue in your screenshot)
during the automation sync yesterday, we discussed https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2944 and recognized it would not be done in Q1
Yep, we had to get something very minimal out there to help unblock P&G's ai hub adoption a few months back, but we definitely plan to make this a lot friendlier.
